outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to combine the eradication of extreme poverty with environmental conservation through PES Programme - Payment for Environmental Services (Programa Bolsa Verde). The project will achieve this through the following 4 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) Strategy application of economic instruments that green development defined; (ii) PES monitoring programme with social inclusion defined, deployed and systematized; (ii) PES inclusion strategy on sustainable production and (iv) Efficient management of the project.

project_descr: Programa de Pagamento por Serviços Ambientais com Inclusão Social
project_title: BRA/11/021- PROGRAM FOR ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES PAYMENT
